item.title: Scaling your platform
item.description: With our solutions, your trading platform can handle peak loads of over 300.000 trades/sec with the added benefit of being flexible enough to handle changing customer functional requirements.

item.title: Minimize the downtime of your trading platform.
item.description: Our focus on the quality of our components, efforts to be backward compatibility and our redundant deployments, minimize the downtime of your platform.

item.title: Making your platform more efficient
item.description: Our solutions reduce infrastructure complexity and associated costs. We offer flexible deployment options, complete documentation, API enabled services and no restriction on the number of markets.

item.title: Making your platform more credible
item.description: Our solutions make sure your platform’s accounting is consistent, is auditable and verifiable. Within our components, self-trading and rounding errors do not occur.

item.title: Interested in one of our components or want to get your hands on demo infrastructure?
